thread.title: FAA awards $24.5 million in environmental grants to airports
thread.title_full: FAA awards $24.5 million in environmental grants to airports

title: FAA awards $24.5 million in environmental grants to airports
text:
23 FAA awards $24.5 million in environmental grants to airports 
Government Security News: Washington, DC – U.S. Transportation Secretary Anthony Foxx recently awarded $24.5 million in Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) grants to 11 airports around the country to reduce emissions and improve air quality through the FAA’s Voluntary Airport Low Emission (VALE) and Zero Emissions Airport Vehicle (ZEV) programs.
